content: In watchOS 7 and later, users can share customized Apple Watch faces, which are saved as WATCHFACE files. When a user adds a WATCHFACE file as a watch face, their Apple Watch checks for the apps that provide that watch face's complications. If the user is missing any requisite apps, their Apple Watch prompts them to install the missing apps.
To share a watch face from your Apple Watch, press firmly on the watch face. Then, press the share button that appears, and use Messages to send your watch face to another iOS or Apple Watch user.
On iOS devices, you can share an Apple Watch face by opening the face in the Apple Watch app and selecting the share button that appears in the app's upper right-hand corner.

description: A WATCHFACE file is a watch face created for use with an Apple Watch. It contains all the complications placed on the watch face, as well as any specified colors, features, or images. Users can share WATCHFACE files from their Apple Watch or the Apple Watch app for iOS.

instructions: You can open a WATCHFACE file in the Apple Watch app for iOS devices. To do so, install the Apple Watch app, transfer the file to your iOS device, and then tap the file. Your file will then open in the Apple Watch app.
After you open a WATCHFACE file in the iOS Apple Watch app, the app will prompt you to add the file to your faces. Adding the file to your faces will make it available on your Apple Watch.
